translation.en: Whoo. All right, guys, the Garvey Games announcements are about to come out.
translation.it: Ok, stanno per annunciare i nuovi Garvey Games.

translation.en: Ooh! I haven't been this nervous since I made eye contact with Kirstie Alley on that Southwest flight.
translation.it: Non ero così agitata da quando Kirstie Alley mi ha guardata in aereo.

translation.en: I love the Garvey Games, but I love their buffet even more.
translation.it: Adoro i Garvey Games, ma il loro buffet di più.

translation.en: At a buffet, everybody wins.
Well, except for the last guy.
The last guy does not win.
The Garvey Games are my least favorite time of year. I prefer a competition of the mind, not the body.
translation.it: Odio il periodo dei Garvey Games. Meglio una gara intellettuale che fisica.

translation.en: I bet you're gonna have a lot of dream catchers when you grow up.
translation.it: Scommetto che da grande avrai un sacco di acchiappasogni.

translation.en: I didn't move here to lose. So...
-who's our real competition? -Ugh. The Ericksons.
Karine, her husband, Kory, and their boys, Keegan, Kellen, and Kendall.
translation.it: Karine, il marito Kory e i figli Keegan, Kellen e Kendall.

translation.en: All spelled with Ks because they are...
translation.it: Tutti con la K, perché sono...

translation.en: what's the word? Monsters.
Oh! I know Keegan. We both play forward on the hockey team, and we're constantly competing for ice time.
translation.it: A hockey mi gioco sempre il posto in squadra con Keegan.

translation.en: He's a real butthead.
Yeah. The Ericksons have won the Garvey Games the last seven years in a row.
translation.it: Gli Erickson vincono da sette anni di fila.

translation.en: But not this year.
Ooh! I cannot wait to see Karine cry tears of defeat,
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di vedere Karine in lacrime.

translation.en: and I will use those tears
to salt the glass of my victory margarita, which I will drink out of her skull.
translation.it: nel Margarita della vittoria che berrò dal suo teschio.

translation.en: Wait, Mom, isn't Karine one of your oldest friends?
translation.it: Ma non è una tua cara amica?

translation.en: Oh, my God, yes. I love her. She's my doubles partner.
translation.it: Oddio, sì, è la mia compagna di doppio.

translation.en: No, you do not want to peel that onion.
The country assignments are in. Please, let us get USA.
translation.it: Assegnano i Paesi. Ti prego, dacci gli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: [all chanting] USA! USA!
Or Japan. Or any G7 country.
translation.it: O il Giappone, o uno del G7.

translation.en: [all chanting] Any G7! Any G7!
And we got...
the Federated States of Micronesia?
-What? -Seriously?
-Come on! -Such a beautiful chain of islands!
Okay, okay. You know what? We can work with this. We can make this work.
Okay, now event assignments for the first round.
translation.it: Ok, le discipline del primo round.

translation.en: Lola, Pop-A-Shot.
Swish-swish, baby.
JJ, you're on Hula-Hoop.
I have hoop-bearing hips.
Show, you got shot put.
Oh, yeah, that's way more on-brand for me. Last year, I had limbo.
translation.it: Sì, molto più adatto a me. L'anno scorso avevo il limbo.

translation.en: I still feel bad I turned that stick to sawdust.
translation.it: Mi spiace di aver disintegrato quel bastone.

translation.en: And I will do the sumo event.
Ha! We are taking down the Ericksons this year.
Hello. Aloha. Konnichiwa. Guten Tag.
Don't forget about ol' Mandy.
Oh, no, honey. We didn't forget about you. We reassigned you to the most important position of all.
translation.it: Tesoro, non ti ho dimenticata. Tu avrai il ruolo più importante.

translation.en: [gasps] Chairman of the Fed?
We don't want you to run. Remember what happened last year?
translation.it: Non devi correre. Ricordi l'anno scorso?

translation.en: I do hate running. It's the yelling of exercise.
translation.it: Sì, odio correre. È l'urlare dell'attività fisica.

translation.en: Okay everyone, on three. One, two, three.
translation.it: Ok, al tre. Uno, due, tre.

translation.en: [all] The Federated States of Micronesia!
Oof. That does not roll off the tongue.
-Let's try the initials. -Okay.
-TFSOM! -TFSOM!
-Yeah! -TFSOM!
...SOM!
Nope. That's much worse.
[sighing] I am so tired.
Did Mom really have to wake us up like that?
What time is it?
It's tomorrow in Micronesia, so we're already behind!
translation.it: In Micronesia è già domani, siamo indietro!

translation.en: No one should have to get up at 4:00 a.m. unless there's a royal wedding.
translation.it: Nessuno dovrebbe alzarsi alle 4, se non per le nozze reali.

translation.en: Hey, so are you sure you're cool with being the manager? I mean, you're not really into sports, right?
translation.it: Ti sta bene fare la manager? Non sei una grande sportiva, no?

translation.en: No. The only sports movie I like is Moneyball
translation.it: L'unico bel film sportivo è L'arte di vincere,

translation.en: because the hero is math.
Plus, I know Mom wants to beat Karine.
I'm so confused. What's going on with that friendship?
translation.it: Non capisco, sono amiche o no?

translation.en: Okay, let me break it down. They've been friends forever.
translation.it: Ok, ti spiego: sono amiche da sempre,

translation.en: They're super competitive, and they say they like each other,
translation.it: sono competitive e dicono di volersi bene,

translation.en: but their words never really match their faces.
translation.it: ma sono sempre solo parole al vento.

translation.en: Love your top, Cassy.
I think I wore it last season.
Oh, but luckily, we live in Florida, where there are no seasons.
translation.it: Per fortuna, in Florida non ci sono stagioni.

translation.en: Oh, there are at my cabin in the mountains.
translation.it: Nella mia baita in montagna sì.

translation.en: Did I not tell you?
We bought a really expensive cabin in the mountains, in cash.
translation.it: Ne abbiamo presa una costosa, in contanti.

translation.en: Oh, you paid in cash,
like the Russian mob or a drug dealer.
translation.it: Come la mafia e gli spacciatori!

translation.en: -So risky. -[laughs]
She smiles while she says mean things,
just like a British person.
Do you want the over or the under in the wheelbarrow race? Got it.
translation.it: Su cosa punti nella corsa in carriola? Capito.

translation.en: Are you gambling on the Garvey Games?
It's not gambling if you win.
JJ, you know gambling is illegal.
Relax. I don't deal in cash.
It's strictly a candy operation.
I got a guy on the inside in Vegas.
translation.it: Ho un uomo a Las Vegas.

translation.en: He works the high-roller counter at M&M World.
translation.it: Sbanca le macchinette del M&M's World.

translation.en: They have chocolate chip, blueberry, and churro.
translation.it: Scaglie di cioccolato, mirtillo e churro.

translation.en: I got one of each 'cause they're free.
translation.it: Li ho presi tutti, sono gratis.

translation.en: No. You can't eat that.
You're competing. You're important.
Here you go, Mandy.
Yay. Manager pancakes.
Okay, Lola, listen up.
There are only three families we need to worry about. The rest are amateurs.
translation.it: Solo tre famiglie ci impensieriscono. Gli altri sono dilettanti.

translation.en: The Ortegas,
great climbers, both rock and social.
translation.it: Grandi scalatori, su roccia e sociali.

translation.en: -Got it. -The Roberts.
Canadian, but don't kid yourself,
they will step on your neck, and they won't say sorry.
translation.it: non si faranno problemi a triturarti.

translation.en: But the real competition,
the thorn in our side, the cavity in our mouths,
translation.it: la spina nel fianco, la carie nei denti,

translation.en: -the wedgie in our undies-- -Cassy--
translation.it: - la mutanda tra le chiappe... - Cassy.

translation.en: I'm talking about them.
Every year, the Ericksons get Team USA, and we get some terrible country.
translation.it: Gli Erickson hanno sempre gli Stati Uniti e noi un paese terribile.

translation.en: I think they're bribing the school.
In their defense, they did hire Usher's cousin to write the new school anthem. It's a real bop.
translation.it: Però conoscevano il cugino di Usher. Il suo inno della scuola è una bomba.

translation.en: Happy Garvey Games, guys.
translation.it: Auguri per i giochi, ragazzi. Oddio.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. I love the Micronesian shirts.
translation.it: Auguri per i giochi, ragazzi. Oddio. Che belle le magliette micronesiane, così modeste e raffazzonate.

translation.en: They're so wonderfully basic and thrown together.
translation.it: Che belle le magliette micronesiane, così modeste e raffazzonate.

translation.en: We were inspired by your makeup.
Well, good luck this year.
-Oh, my gosh. Good luck to you. -Oh! Give me a hug.
translation.it: - Oh, buona fortuna a voi. - Abbracciami.

translation.en: Oh, these feel so flammable.
-Good luck. -Yeah.
Oh, the National Resources Defense Council. I love that organization.
translation.it: Il Consiglio di difesa delle risorse naturali! Lo adoro!

translation.en: Their e-mail blasts are poetry.
Totally. I mean, we only have one...
[both] Earth.
Exactly.
Hi. I'm Summer.
I like the way you think. Are you an NPFM?
translation.it: Mi piace come ragioni. Sei un FNP?

translation.en: Uh, what's an NPFM?
Non-participant family member.
We're the family members who don't participate in this trivial display of chest-bumping hubris.
translation.it: Siamo i familiari che non partecipano a questa ridicola esibizione di alterigia.

translation.en: OMG! Hubris is my favorite H-word.
translation.it: Oh mio Dio! "Alterigia" è la mia parola preferita!

translation.en: Mine's "helioseismology."
You know, you should come hang out with me and the NPFMs in room 2B.
translation.it: Perché non vieni con me e gli FNP nell'aula 2B?

translation.en: Oh, thank you, but I'm just here to support my family today.
translation.it: Grazie, ma devo fare il tifo per la mia famiglia.

translation.en: Okay. Well, it's up to you.
Favorite U-word, go!
translation.it: Parola preferita con la U, vai!

translation.en: [both] Ungulate.
Ung-you-later.
Welcome to the 17th Annual Garvey Games!
translation.it: Benvenuti alla 17ª edizione dei Garvey Games!

translation.en: -[clapping] -There's nothing I'd like to do more on my summer vacation than come to work.
translation.it: Quanto è bello passare le vacanze venendo al lavoro!

translation.en: Yeah, and this year, we've added a sick new event:
translation.it: Sì, e quest'anno c'è una nuova disciplina pazzesca.

translation.en: Hands on a WaveRunner.
Yeah. It's like Hands on a Hard Body,
except you put your hands on a brand-new WaveRunner.
translation.it: ma con una moto d'acqua nuova di zecca.

translation.en: The winner gets the WaveRunner,
in case that wasn't obvious.
I've never wanted anything more in my entire life.
translation.it: È il mio più grande desiderio.

translation.en: To kick off the games, let's welcome our mascot,
translation.it: Diamo il via ai giochi con la nostra mascotte,

translation.en: Manny the Manatee,
and our student band, the Bandatees!
translation.it: e la nostra band studentesca, i Bandatini!

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh! And here comes little Desmond with the Garvey Games torch.
translation.it: Ecco Desmond con la torcia dei Garvey Games.

translation.en: Yes. I had three to one on that kid dropping the torch.
translation.it: Sì! Avevo puntato tre a uno che la faceva cadere.

translation.en: Knew he was a butterfinger.
Now, ironically, you owe me a Snickers.
translation.it: E ora mi devi uno Snickers.

translation.en: JJ, I'm gonna play you something I listen to to hype myself up.
translation.it: JJ, senti cosa ascolto per darmi la carica.

translation.en: It's me... talking to me.
translation.it: Io che parlo a me stessa.

translation.en: [Lola on phone] Lola, you're faster than lightning.
Lola, you're nimble as a puma.
Lola, you're as strong as the bond between Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber.
translation.it: Lola, forte come la relazione tra Selena Gomez e Justin Bieber.

translation.en: I recorded this a while ago.
Hey, Micros.
I hope JJ's ready for the Hula-Hoop competition.
translation.it: Spero che JJ sia pronta per l'hula-hoop.

translation.en: Kendall's Hula-Hoop trainer said that he has Shakira hips,
translation.it: Per l'allenatore, Kendall si muove come Shakira,

translation.en: and he don't lie.
Mmm. That's sweet. Yeah, JJ doesn't need training.
translation.it: Che dolce. JJ non ha bisogno di allenarsi.

translation.en: As a baby, she sat, crawled, Hula-Hooped, then walked.
translation.it: Da piccola ha imparato l'hula-hoop prima di camminare.

translation.en: I love Hula-Hoop. I love an ice-cream scoop.
translation.it: Adoro l'hula-hoop. E le palline di gelato.

translation.en: I love anything that rhymes with "poop."
translation.it: Tutto ciò che mi fa fare la cacca.

translation.en: She's a genius.
All right, participants, grab your Hula-Hoops.
And on my whistle, start hooping.
-Okay, let's go. -[whistle blows]
-Go, go, go! Yes, JJ! -Come on!
-No, move your hips! -Move!
-Come on! -Move your hips!
What? Wait. JJ, what happened?
I bet against myself. By losing, I'm actually winning.
translation.it: Ho puntato contro me stessa. Perdendo, sto vincendo.

translation.en: Wicked smart, right?
Jennifer Jane, you cannot gamble. You especially can't bet on the sport you're playing in.
translation.it: Jennifer Jane, non si gioca d'azzardo. Non puoi scommettere sul tuo sport.

translation.en: Oh, that makes a lot of sense. They should make that a rule.
translation.it: In effetti ha senso. Servirebbe una regola.

translation.en: It's literally the number one rule.
translation.it: È la regola numero uno, sai.

translation.en: Okay, no bathroom breaks.
translation.it: Ok, niente pause per il bagno,

translation.en: No food breaks. No cutting the brakes on teachers' cars.
translation.it: per mangiare o per tagliare i freni agli insegnanti.

translation.en: Fool me twice, James.
-May the best hand win. -[whistle blows]
Hope you're ready to accept defeat.
Please. I've wanted one of these water motorcycles for a long time.
translation.it: Ti prego... Non sai da quanto voglio una di queste.

translation.en: No regular-sized man's gonna stop me.
Oh, is that a water bottle from the musical Wicked?
Yeah. You got a problem with that?
Uh, yeah, considering you probably don't even appreciate what a soaring theatrical accomplishment it is.
translation.it: Sì, non credo tu sappia apprezzare il suo stellare successo teatrale.

translation.en: Please. I've seen it 14 times and once in Japanese.
translation.it: Ti prego... L'ho visto 14 volte, una in giapponese.

translation.en: Well, I've seen it with Idina Menzel.
What? You've seen it with the OBC? The original Broadway cast?
translation.it: Cosa? L'hai visto con il cast originale di Broadway?

translation.en: Orchestra center, son.
You know, Garvey Prep should do that as their next musical.
Oh, your Mandy would be a terrific Elphaba. She's got the pipes.
translation.it: Mandy sarebbe perfetta come Elphaba. Ha la voce giusta.

translation.en: Thank you. And your son Kellen would be a great stage manager.
translation.it: Grazie. E tuo figlio Kellen sarebbe un grande direttore di scena.

translation.en: Anything with a clipboard is where he shines.
Well, he's out. Apparently, no WaveRunner is worth listening to two supersized drama dorks.
translation.it: Lui è fuori. Non vale la pena stare ad ascoltarvi per una moto d'acqua.

translation.en: Mandy. Glad you're here.
Let me give you a tour.
Okay.
So that's our meditation corner.
Those are feminist crochet beanbags.
And, ooh, would you like some of our vegan charcuterie?
translation.it: dei pouf femministi all'uncinetto e... Ti vanno degli assaggi vegani?

translation.en: Oh, my God. Did I just die and wake up in a TED Talk?
translation.it: Oddio, sono morta e sono finita in un TED Talk?

translation.en: Welcome home, sister.
Thank you. I am never leaving.
Shoot. We're already down four medals to the Ericksons.
translation.it: Gli Erickson hanno già quattro medaglie di vantaggio.

translation.en: It's okay. I'm about to school the USA in Pop-A-Shot.
translation.it: Tranquilla, ora darò una bella lezione agli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: They call me the LeBron James of Micronesia.
translation.it: Sono la LeBron James della Micronesia.

translation.en: Hey, Keegan.
I'm in your head now.
[coughing] Oh, my God.
That was a lot of chalk.
[Cassy] Okay, come on, Lola! Go, go, go, go!
Yes! Oh, my gosh, you're killing it!
Get it, girl!
-Yes! Lola! Whoo! -[whistle blows]
-[Miss Riggi] Micronesia! -Yes!
Yes! Whoo! Yes!
-And the winner is... -Yes, yes?
Jeez!
Yes!
What JJ doesn't realize is I've been watering down her Capri Suns the whole time.
translation.it: JJ non sa che ho sempre annacquato i suoi succhi Capri Sun.

translation.en: No, no, no, we don't even allow those in our house.
I make my own drink. Half water, half lemon juice.
translation.it: Li faccio io: metà acqua e metà succo di limone.

translation.en: Call it Erick-Suns. You know, like our last name.
Oh, I get it, bro. And I love it.
All right, time check.
Three hours. What a waste.
Man, time really flies when you're connecting with someone.
translation.it: Il tempo vola quando c'è sintonia.

translation.en: Truth, man, truth. [groans]
My shoulder won't stop acting up after fixing Kellen's bike.
translation.it: Ho la spalla a pezzi, ho riparato la bici di Kellen.

translation.en: Hey, let me at that shoulder. I'll show you a trick I learned back in my WWE days.
translation.it: Vieni qua, ti faccio un trucchetto che ho imparato nella WWE.

translation.en: What are you-- Okay, man to man?
translation.it: Cosa... Ok, che resti tra noi...

translation.en: -Yeah. -This feels really good.
Ow! What? And that's to remind you to stay on your side.
translation.it: - Ma che... - E non starmi addosso.

translation.en: Good job, honey. [laughs]
Hey, guys, great news.
We're both in the finals. How fun is that?
translation.it: Siamo in finale insieme, non è bello?

translation.en: Oh, the funnest fun.
Can I just say that I am so glad it's your family we're up against?
translation.it: Sono veramente contenta di essere contro di voi.

translation.en: Oh, so glad. I mean, like, so glad.
I know. I'm, like, super-duper glad.
Wow. I'm gonna say something bold.
I think that was my favorite Terry Gross interview to date.
translation.it: È la mia nuova intervista a Terry Gross preferita.

translation.en: Absolutely. Co-sign.
Wow. [sniffs] It smells like a public library in here.
Welcome, JJ. Please remove your shoes.
Not happening, dawg. I just came to check on you.
translation.it: Scordatelo. Volevo vedere se stavi bene.

translation.en: Aw. That's so sweet.
But I've never felt so connected to a group in my life.
translation.it: Non mi sono mai sentita così legata a un gruppo.

translation.en: These people are my people.
So, nerds?
Oh, which reminds me. I need you to hold my stash of Nerds.
translation.it: A proposito, devi tenermi la scorta di Nerds.

translation.en: Why are you giving this to me?
It's my emergency candy stash. Don't give it to me.
translation.it: Sono le mie caramelle d'emergenza. Non darmele.

translation.en: Even if I beg, cry, or plead.
If I look like I'm dying,
and the only thing that'll save me is a Twix,
translation.it: e l'unica cosa che può salvarmi è un Twix,

translation.en: do not give it to me!
Jeez, I get it. So dramatic.
Cool.
Oh, hey, can you just toss me a Kit Kat for the road?
Sure.
What did I just say?
Hey, man, it's been really great getting to know you.
Sucks that we both can't have this WaveRunner.
I was thinking the same thing. It's like we have the same brain.
translation.it: Già, è come se avessimo lo stesso cervello.

translation.en: Well, here's a thought that you probably are also thinking because we share a brain. Duh.
translation.it: Ho un'idea che forse hai anche tu, avendo lo stesso cervello.

translation.en: What if we take our hands off at the exact same time?
translation.it: Se togliessimo le mani nello stesso momento?

translation.en: And share custody of the WaveRunner?
Yes. I'll take it out Fourth of July, and you take it out Labor Day.
translation.it: Sì, io il 4 luglio e tu la festa del lavoro.

translation.en: I love that.
Hey, would it be crazy if we just rode it one time together?
translation.it: Sarebbe assurdo andarci insieme una volta?

translation.en: -Whoo! -Oh, this is awesome!
-This is super fun! -Whoo!
Now I only want to ride this together.
Let's take our hands off when I say go.
Ready, set...
go.
Ladies and gentlemen, we finally have a winner.
Oh, man! Oh, this is awesome!
I've always wanted to win one of these.
Oh, man, never wanted to buy one, but I did wanna win one.
translation.it: Non l'ho mai voluta comprare, ma vincerla sì.

translation.en: [sighs] Let me tell you something. The real prize, the real prize,
translation.it: Ma vi dico una cosa: il vero premio

translation.en: was watching
this beautiful friendship unfold and blossom right in front of me.
translation.it: questa amicizia stupenda sbocciare davanti a me.

translation.en: Two grown, adult men.
You two. The real heroes.
translation.it: Voi due siete i veri eroi.

translation.en: Do you have any family at this school?
No. No.
Hey, listen, I'm a real big fan. You think you can, uh...
translation.it: Ehi, sono un tuo grande fan. Potresti...

translation.en: autograph it right there where your hand was, uh...
before you lost?
Anything for a fan.
Oh, man, this is sweet.
I am never washing this off.
The ocean might,
but the memory will always be right here.
translation.it: ma terrò il ricordo sempre qui.

translation.en: Here we go. This is gonna be my new dating profile pic.
translation.it: Ecco, la mia nuova foto profilo per incontri.

translation.en: -Take that, Marsha. -[camera clicks]
All right, we're down to only two families:
the Wights and the Ericksons.
Now, here are your rules for the final relay race.
translation.it: Ecco le regole per la staffetta finale.

translation.en: One, no open-toed shoes.
This isn't Bible times or a Phish concert.
translation.it: Non siamo ai tempi della Bibbia.

translation.en: And two, all members of the family must pass the baton to each other.
translation.it: Due: tutta la famiglia deve passarsi il testimone.

translation.en: And by the way, instead of batons, we have eggs.
translation.it: Invece del testimone, useremo le uova.

translation.en: Exciting stuff, fam.
Oh, Cassy, did you hear that?
All family members have to compete. Where's your other daughter?
translation.it: Deve partecipare tutta la famiglia. L'altra tua figlia?

translation.en: Oh, no, all my daughters are here. Let's get started.
I don't see the middle one. You know, the one with a thyroid problem.
translation.it: Non vedo la mezzana. Quella con problemi di tiroide.

translation.en: Mandy doesn't have a thyroid problem.
translation.it: Mandy non ha problemi di tiroide.

translation.en: -I knew you had another daughter. -Dang it.
Cassy, come on.
Look, I also want to win, but this is going too far.
translation.it: Anch'io voglio vincere, ma stiamo esagerando.

translation.en: Okay, fine.
I'll go get Mandy. And her perfect thyroid!
translation.it: Chiamo Mandy e la sua tiroide perfetta.

translation.en: [gasps] The 1911 Triangle Shirtwaist fire.
-Yes. -Yes!
Hey. Uh, let's go, honey. We need you to compete in the final relay.
translation.it: Vieni, tesoro. Devi fare la staffetta finale.

translation.en: But we're playing Historical Tragedies Pictionary.
What? Oh, no. You're gonna have to come back to sad Pictionary later. Come on.
translation.it: Cosa? Oh, no. Devi rimandare la tristezza. Andiamo.

translation.en: But I don't wanna leave this place.
This is my heaven.
Mom, I think I'm an indoor kid.
translation.it: Sono una da posti al chiuso.

translation.en: Oh, honey, of course you are.
When you were four, you said your sworn enemy was the beach.
translation.it: A quattro anni hai giurato guerra alla spiaggia.

translation.en: Look, Mandy, I am sorry. What happened this morning when I sidelined you, that was wrong.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Ho sbagliato a lasciarti in disparte.

translation.en: You know, if I participate, we're gonna lose,
translation.it: Se partecipo, perderemo. E probabilmente vomiterò.

translation.en: and I'm probably gonna throw up. I've had so many pieces of cashew cheese,
translation.it: Se partecipo, perderemo. E probabilmente vomiterò. Ho lo stomaco straziato da tutto quel formaggio vegano.

translation.en: my stomach is barking.
translation.it: Ho lo stomaco straziato da tutto quel formaggio vegano.

translation.en: And, honey, if we lose, that's fine.
The family being together is what matters,
and whatever happens, we'll have a lot more fun with you by our side.
translation.it: Comunque vada, sarà più bello se ci sei anche tu.

translation.en: What do you say?
[sighs] Okay, Mom.
For you and only you, I'll do it.
translation.it: Lo faccio per te e solo per te.

translation.en: Okay. Come on.
Okay.
Goodbye, soul mates. I hope we meet again.
And, Summer, I'll see you in the comments section of the New Yorker online.
translation.it: Summer, ci vediamo nei commenti sul sito del New Yorker.

translation.en: [loudly] All right, everyone.
I don't need this. My voice is a natural megaphone.
translation.it: Via questo, la mia voce è un megafono naturale.

translation.en: If you break your egg, you'll be disqualified,
and you'll be charged for the egg.
Eggs don't grow on trees, people. That's just science.
translation.it: Mica crescono sugli alberi, è scienza!

translation.en: We are so close to being champs, y'all. I can feel it.
translation.it: Possiamo diventare campioni, me lo sento.

translation.en: Okay, okay, here is the lineup. I will go first on dizzy bat.
translation.it: Ok, l'ordine di partenza: io alla giravolta.

translation.en: Show, JJ, Slinky race. Lola, tunnel crawl,
translation.it: Show e JJ: alle molle. Lola: tunnel.

translation.en: and Mandy, you are last on tricycle.
Wait, wait, you're putting me last? That's way too much pressure.
Mandy, you'll be a great anchor.
But an anchor's the thing that literally stops the ship.
translation.it: Ma è l'ancora che blocca la nave!

translation.en: Okay. [clears throat]
Oh, hey, Karine, try not to use this in your signature egg salad.
translation.it: Ehi, Karine, non usarlo per la tua insalata,

translation.en: You know, the one that gave everyone gas at the school picnic.
translation.it: quella che ha gonfiato lo stomaco a tutti.

translation.en: At least I made something. You just brought KFC.
translation.it: Almeno ho preparato qualcosa, tu hai ordinato da KFC.

translation.en: Mmm. And it went so fast.
On your mark, get set, go! -Oh! -[whistle blows]
Come on! Go!
-Okay, come on, Mandy, start pedaling. -Go, go!
I... I can't do this. Just disown me, so I won't be a part of the family,
translation.it: Non ci riesco. Ripudiami dalla famiglia, così potrete vincere.

translation.en: and you can win without me.
translation.it: Ripudiami dalla famiglia, così potrete vincere.

translation.en: Mom, I'm not a cat.
Snap out of it. You are a part of this family.
And not only are you going to participate, you are going to win!
Come on! Go!
-Yes! Go, go, go, go! -That's it!
-Mandy, go, go, go, go, go! -Yes!
-Yes! -[Big Show] You can do it! Come on, Mandy!
[crowd chanting] Mandy! Mandy! Mandy! Mandy! Mandy! Mandy! Mandy!
No, there is no way they won.
translation.it: Non può aver vinto lei. È impossibile.

translation.en: No way. I challenge.
translation.it: Non può aver vinto lei. È impossibile. - Faccio ricorso. - Ha vinto lealmente.

translation.en: No, no, we won fair and square.
No, there's no way that your weak indoor child beat my Kellen.
translation.it: Quella scansafatiche non può aver battuto il mio Kellen.

translation.en: What did you say about my daughter?
I said that she is weak and lame, like the rest of your dumb family.
translation.it: Che è una patetica scansafatiche, come tutti voi.

translation.en: Oh, Mandy! Oh, honey, are you-- [gags]
Mandy. Mandy.
You know it's bad when Mom puts herself in a time-out.
translation.it: Quando si mette in punizione è grave.

translation.en: She did get us disqualified for unsportsmanlike conduct.
translation.it: Ci ha fatto squalificare per condotta antisportiva.

translation.en: Yeah, the screaming, the rage,
the way she tore that trophy apart with her bare hands.
translation.it: come ha distrutto il trofeo a mani nude...

translation.en: I fell in love all over again. [chuckles]
Look at my haul. It's another great day to be JJ.
translation.it: Guardate che bottino. Un'altra grande giornata per JJ.

translation.en: How much did you gamble?
A lot.
I thought candy was addicting,
but gambling is very addicting.
translation.it: ma il gioco d'azzardo molto di più.

translation.en: They should warn people about that.
Wow. That is a lot of candy.
I bet everything on you.
translation.it: Ho puntato tutto su di te.

translation.en: You're my sister. I believed in you.
translation.it: Sei mia sorella, credevo in te.

translation.en: Oh, JJ, that's so sweet.
I also bet ten to one you'd blow chunks,
so I cleaned house, baby.
Cassy, I think you've been in time-out long enough.
No, I haven't been punished enough.
Maybe you should roll up the newspaper and hit me on the nose a couple times.
translation.it: Prendi il giornale e sbattimelo sul naso.

translation.en: Okay, first of all, you're not a dog,
translation.it: Prima di tutto, non sei un cane.

translation.en: and second, what's a newspaper?
I just... I cannot believe I acted like that.
translation.it: Io... non so cosa mi sia preso.

translation.en: Karine is supposed to be my friend.
Cassy, let me tell you a story.
[laughs] So, you're telling me stories now?
Yes.
Back in Minnesota, I had this friend who was also named Lola.
translation.it: In Minnesota avevo un'amica, si chiamava Lola.

translation.en: We hated each other, but we pretended to be friends because we both had the same name.
translation.it: Facevamo finta di non odiarci perché avevamo lo stesso nome.

translation.en: Well, that's dumb.
Exactly.
Things got really messy between Lola Two and me.
Oh, so you were Lola Number One?
No. I was just Lola. Why does everyone always ask that?
translation.it: No, Lola e basta. Perché me lo chiedono tutti?

translation.en: The point is, one day, I sent her a radically honest text saying I didn't want to be friends anymore.
translation.it: Un giorno le ho scritto sinceramente che non volevo più essere sua amica.

translation.en: Oh, you can just do that? That's an option?
Yes.
And the second I hit send, I felt a weight had been lifted.
translation.it: E mi sono subito sentita sollevata.

translation.en: You should do that with Karine.
No, you're... you're right. But how?
I think I figured out a way to fix it.
Did you Postmates wine? Good call.
-Hey. -[gasps]
Nobody's here! Go away! You have breached the alarm system. You will be arrested.
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno. Andatevene! Allarme attivato, sarete arrestati.

translation.en: Cops.
Two words: radical honesty.
Karine, Kory, how are you?
Okay, you know what? Forget it.
I am too tired from today to do this.
Karine, can I talk to you?
Okay.
[excitedly] Oh, hey, Karine. Is Kory here?
I mean, whatever. I mean, if he's here, I'll go say hi.
translation.it: Cioè, non che mi importi. Se è qui, vado a salutarlo.

translation.en: You know, if you hear any laughing or...
harmonizing, you know, just being polite.
translation.it: o dell'armonia, è solo per educazione.

translation.en: Whatever.
Okay, uh...
Let me start by saying
I am so sorry I threw an egg at your back.
translation.it: che mi dispiace di averti tirato l'uovo.

translation.en: That was so childish of me, and I knew it was wrong
translation.it: È stato infantile e sapevo che era sbagliato perché...

translation.en: because it felt so good.
translation.it: È stato infantile e sapevo che era sbagliato perché... mi è piaciuto.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Thank you, but I think that I was at fault.
translation.it: No, grazie, ma credo di aver sbagliato io.

translation.en: And I don't know what this thing is that we do, but it's exhausting.
translation.it: Non so cosa stiamo facendo, ma è estenuante.

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna try something.
It's called radical honesty.
Here goes.
I don't want to be friends with you anymore.
translation.it: Non voglio più essere tua amica.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I feel the exact same way.
Oh! [laughs] This is, like, the first thing we've ever agreed on.
-This is amazing. I feel so alive. -[laughing]
Oh, my gosh. So, what do we do next?
Well, pfft, I'll tell you what we don't have to do.
translation.it: Ecco cosa non dobbiamo fare: prendere il caffè,

translation.en: -Coffee, yogalates, bag parties, -Ugh. Yes.
translation.it: Ecco cosa non dobbiamo fare: prendere il caffè, yogalates, gli incontri per le borse, organizzare il ballo...

translation.en: co-chairing the school dance.
translation.it: yogalates, gli incontri per le borse, organizzare il ballo...

translation.en: -Never. -Winesday, Thurswine.
-Brunch... -Yes. -...uh, football Sunday... -Yeah.
-...annual Cabo trip... -Oh, God. ...and Christmas dinner.
translation.it: - la gita a Cabo, la cena di Natale. - Dio!

translation.en: Wait,
so can we not be friends on social media?
translation.it: possiamo non essere amiche sui social?

translation.en: -Yes. -[laughs]
A thousand times, yes. Okay. Okay. Grab your phones.
translation.it: Assolutamente sì. Ok, prendi il telefono.

translation.en: We are going to consciously unfriend each other right now.
-Okay. -Okay. Facebook first. On three.
One, two, three.
[laughs] Okay, now, Instagram.
-Done. -One, two, three.
Everyone, Karine and I have an announcement to make.
translation.it: Io e Karine dobbiamo fare un annuncio.

translation.en: We are no longer friends.
Wait, wait, wait. What does that-- Wait. What?
This is good. Yeah, it's good.
-Thank you, and I look forward... -Thank you. ...to ignoring you in the hallways at school.
translation.it: Grazie, non vedo l'ora di ignorarti nei corridoi a scuola.

translation.en: -See you not later. -Hmm. See you not later.
translation.it: - Non ci vediamo. - Non ci vediamo a te.

translation.en: Done. Done. Done. Done.
Let's go home, Kory. I'm done.
translation.it: A casa, Kory. Qui ho finito.

translation.en: Can we still be friends?
Nah, bro. Dolls before Guys and Dolls.
translation.it: No, è la vita, non un musical.

translation.en: Does this mean we're not seeing Guys and Dolls together?
translation.it: E non vedremo Guys and Dolls?

translation.en: No, of course we're seeing G and D together.
Who's gonna get mad if we just happened to sit next to each other
translation.it: Chi può dire niente se capitiamo in posti vicini

translation.en: wearing matching fedoras?
Probably the people behind you.
Cassy, we're proud of you.
Oh, and I'm proud of you.
Guys, no matter what anyone says, we won the Garvey Games,
translation.it: Non importa cosa dicono gli altri, abbiamo vinto i Garvey Games,

translation.en: and we did it by sticking together as a family.
translation.it: Non importa cosa dicono gli altri, abbiamo vinto i Garvey Games, restando uniti come una famiglia.

translation.en: Okay, everyone, Micronesia on three.
One, two, three.
[all] The Federated States of Micronesia!
Nope, never gonna work.
We better get something good next year.
And the Garvey Games country for this year is...
translation.it: Il Paese per i Garvey Games di quest'anno è...

translation.en: the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg?
Come on!
